jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Strategic
• Strategize different ways to build talent pipelines and execute on tactical research, referral generation, events and sourcing campaigns
• Identify and activate new sourcing channels in market and across APAC region
• Use of talent market insights and data to influence decisions with Business Partners
• Proactively recommend and drive process improvements that impact candidate identification and engagement
• Partner with our employer brand team to use in-region sourcing and branding strategies to attract local talent
 
Operational
• Collaborate with Stakeholders to consult and deeply understand the requirements of the role, the function and how it fits into the organization
• Manage a team of Sourcers to manage an efficient model of operation
• Find, engage and activate passive candidates through adopting and developing a diverse array of research techniques, tools and platforms.
• Participate in external sourcing networks to bring state of the art research industry trends
• Regularly track pipeline activity to share with internal stakeholders

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
